thread.section_title: Goodden's Optical Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Goodden's Optical | gooddens.com
thread.title: Cat owner
thread.title_full: Goodden's Optical reviewed by Cat owner

author: Cat owner
title: Cat owner
text:
The service I received from beginning to end was excellent, from the initial consultation to aftercare. Every member of staff I dealt with was friendly, helpful and professional.
The procedure itself was completely painless with a magnificent result. It has far exceeded my expectations.
I would have no hesitation in recommending Optice Express to anyone.
For info I attended Milton Keynes for consultation, Westfield for the surgery and Northampton for my aftercare. Thank you to everyone at Optical Express.
